document_data.name: Wren
document_data.mainbody: A '''wren''' was a type of passerine bird.

Species.Needle: Needle wrens kept the [[locust]] population in check in the [[rimwood]] area of the forest of [[Cormanthor]] south of [[Shadowdale]]. They were received gratefully by local farmers. In the {{YearlinkName|1366}}, a huge swarm of [[fyreflies]] caused a fire that destroyed many of the [[pine]]s in which the wrens lived, causing fears among the farmers that a locust plague would result.

document_data.Trivia: A wren was the smallest creature a caster could change into with the help of the ''[[polymorph self]]'' spell.<ref><ref>
